channel.title: CVE Feed for Atlassian -- Crucible
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Atlassian -- Crucible

item.title: CVE-2020-4015|2024-09-16T18:09:13.525Z -- atlassian -- crucible
item.description: The /json/fe/activeUserFinder.do resource in Altassian Fisheye and Crucible before version 4.8.1 allows remote attackers to view user user email addresses via a information disclosure vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-4016|2024-09-16T16:49:09.315Z -- atlassian -- crucible
item.description: The /plugins/servlet/jira-blockers/ resource in the crucible-jira-ril plugin in Atlassian Fisheye and Crucible before version 4.8.1 allows remote attackers to get the ID of configured Jira application links via an information disclosure vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-4018|2024-09-16T19:14:26.996Z -- atlassian -- crucible
item.description: The setup resources in Atlassian Fisheye and Crucible before version 4.8.1 allows remote attackers to complete the setup process via a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-18089|2024-09-16T16:59:05.739Z -- atlassian -- crucible
item.description: The view review history resource in Atlassian Crucible before version 4.4.3 (the fixed version for 4.4.x) and 4.5.0 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTML or JavaScript via a cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability through the invited reviewers for a review.

item.title: CVE-2017-18095|2024-09-16T17:28:59.763Z -- atlassian -- crucible
item.description: The SnippetRPCServiceImpl class in Atlassian Crucible before version 4.5.1 (the fixed version 4.5.x) and before 4.6.0 allows remote attackers to comment on snippets they do not have authorization to access via an improper authorization vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-4013|2024-09-16T20:36:58.765Z -- atlassian -- crucible
item.description: The review resource in Atlassian Fisheye and Crucible before version 4.8.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTML or Javascript via a cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability through the review objectives.
